LanguageData.BM_SpacerChefSubpersonaChip.label: chef subpersona
LanguageData.BM_SpacerChefSubpersonaChip.description: An advanced brain implant designed to assist the user in cooking and act as a digital encyclopedia on that particular subject. The subpersona can quickly analyze a food item's temperature, consistency and accurately predict the taste with just a quick glance.\n\nA brain implant of such complexity requires time to synchronize with and adapt to its host in order to avoid excessive strain on the central nervous system, its effectiveness will slowly increase during this process. It's capable of syncing with other enhancements made to assist in similar tasks, greatly increasing efficiency.
